website_summaries.verdict: An all-natural, unscented powder that cleans clothes well and leaves them fragrance-free.
pros: Boasts only 4 ingredients, all earth-derived, including magnesium sulfate and Epsom salts
Removes existing odors from fabrics and is fragrance-free
cons: The powdered detergent tends to clump in the package

customer_reviews.title: This soap is amazing!! We have recently switched over to natural ...
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing!! We have recently switched over to natural products after reviewing EWG ratings and seeing basically everything we use is terribly unhealthy...i was pretty hesitant about laundry detergent. I was nervous our clothing wouldn't feel clean. I was WRONG!! Molly's suds clean SO well, don't leave any icky buildup on the clothing, and are not harmful to our skin! I love the packaging, nice and little. I empty the bag into a glass jar with a lid so the packaging gets thrown away anyway, and there is barely any of it, no clunky container, meaning much less waste in our trash. I am definitely converted to Molly's suds from now on. Very happy to have found it!!
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Mama

customer_reviews.title: Caused skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because I am allergic to most detergents, and especially laundry detergents. I was convinced by the advertising hype that it would be gentle to the skin and free of allergens. What I discovered was that I am allergic to this product moreso than some other detergents I have used in the past. Now it is yet another product I have to give away, since it can't be returned after using. It's my problem, not theirs. I just wish these companies sold product in sample sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Z600User

customer_reviews.title: It helped with my skin rash.
customer_reviews.text: I used "All" and other brands of, so called sensitive skin, washing machine soap, and they helped with the itching a lot. But I had to rinse the clothes about 6 times to get residue from the soap out of the clothes. Took about three hours to get most of the soap out and I still had itching and a rash. Moll's Suds has improved things a lot. Thank God for Molly's soap. Amen
customer_reviews.author: Ken Kluk

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I definitely like that it is truly unscented, and that I understand the ingredients. Last “unscented” detergent I washed my clothes with left them reeking of scent. I have one of those awful front loading washers and I put two scoops of Molly’s Suds in with the clothes, and about a half cup of white vinegar in the rinse dispenser, set the washer for prewash and extra rinse. I continue to put some highly diluted dish soap on greasy stains and it all seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Timbarina

customer_reviews.title: Helps with eczema
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders for my daughters eczema flare-ups. I don’t use this every wash because it doesn’t do a great job at getting stains out like my other detergent, but it definitely cleans clothes well that aren’t stained with baby food/poop. When my daughter has a flare-up, I use this and it helps clear it. It works and dissolves well in my HE washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Meg RTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: my clothes smell WONDERFUL. And by that- I don't mean highly fragranced
customer_reviews.text: I was recently hospitalized, and discovered that I need to switch to natural home cleaning products due to hormone imbalances - and not wanting to go on medications, I decided to go the natural route. As always, I thoroughly research everything I buy - and this was 100% what I expected and more. Firstly, my clothes smell WONDERFUL. And by that- I don't mean highly fragranced. I mean they smell CLEAN. My pillow case has gotten softer, and the bargain that you get for this product is outstanding! Plus, the EWG rates this product as one of the best. It's vegan, cruelty free, and safe for my animals. Thank you, Molly's Suds! I'm a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and Laundry powder. My clothes come clean ...even my toddler’s. When I inwardly compare my daughter’s ballet leotard to her friends in class I know I’ve made the right choice. Lol It doesn’t fade colors and it does it’s job. Maybe it’s just my imagination but I feel like when I buy Second hand children’s clothing and wash it with Molly’s suds ( along with attitudes fabric softener) the Fabric comes back to life and becomes significantly softer. I hope they never change the ingredients or change a thing, it’s absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: My skin is thankful ✌️
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin. I did my laundry today and I wore one of the washed and dried shirt right away. No skin reaction so far. But it didn't quite removed deodarant stains on my white shirts but it's like that really with any other laundry soap I buy. I'll try their oxygen whitener, that might do the trick. But I'll continue using this product though.
customer_reviews.author: jCastiel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, mediocre packaging
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find a safe, natural laundry powder with a good EWG rating which actually gets clothes clean without scent. We love it for that. The bag packaging, which I think others have mentioned, isn't ideal - a box might be more manageable and those recloseable zippers aren't always user-friendly, especially with a product that will last this long. My only problem was that about the top 1/3 of the bag was full of lumps, many pebble size but a couple near egg size that made it hard to scoop. I ended up breaking them up and crumbling by hand, which was a little more hands-on than I intended to get with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't live up to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I am very smell sensitive and needed some dry unscented detergent to take on a 5 week trip. I'm glad I had this with me for that reason, but I don't really feel like it cleaned my clothes very well, even when using more than what was recommended. Whites were pretty dingy when we got home.
customer_reviews.author: WineLover

customer_reviews.title: Cloth diaper necessity!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I was skeptical, but I was desperate for the sake of my cloth diapers. No matter what I tried (more detergent, different water levels when washing, bleach, different detergent), they just had a slight smell, especially fresh from the dryer when they were warm. It was driving me crazy. So I decided to give this a try after reading the reviews and researching it a bit. First load of diapers... I could not believe it. The whites were so bright! Brighter than bleached white! The smell was completely gone! I couldn’t have been more ecstatic. If you’re on the fence... get off and get this stuff. It truly worked wonders for my cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.author: nudgul

customer_reviews.title: All natural laundry product that is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans very well, no fragrence to trigger allergies, no phytoestrogens, a really excellent product. And one tiny scoop does a normal load, and only an extra half scoop for my large load HE machines!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent. My clothes are really clean, it’s fragrance free and good for skin. I can’t get over the way my laundry feels when it’s done- I feel like this removes film that was on them from past detergent or maybe fabric softener. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Judyth R. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: SAVED MY SKIN!
customer_reviews.text: This has saved my skin!!!! I started using too much downy apparently and caused myself a really bad allergic reaction, I now can’t use any of the commercial detergents. This gets clothes clean and fresh and is a great value! Just need a scoop for a full load- if you need some scent use the scent beads! Works like a charm! My skin thanks you Molly’s suds!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Clean conscience
customer_reviews.text: First of all I love that Molly's suds is all natural, and I especially love that it's cruelty free. That means so much to me. I've only done 2 loads so far, but so far so good. My clothes seem so nice and clean, no smells, and I have a clean conscience. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Cat1332

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the smell of kitchen out of cloths!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I've only been using it for about a week now, which is still at least 10 loads, but so far I haven't run into any issues. I'm a cook so my clothes get saturated with smells and oils on a regular basis. I used the unscented powder for a couple of washes and my clothes came out smelling not smelly which is pretty much all I can ask for without a chemical flowery smell covering it up. I didn't have any residue leftover on my cloths or washer. I'm very excited to continue using this product and trying out some more!
customer_reviews.author: tracey

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I found a detergent that works, doesn't use heavy chemicals, including fragrances. I've tried a bunch of brands. Used Molly's a few times. It is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Natural Choice
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a detergent with no added chemicals or fragrances. I used the unscented suds, and added 1 T to the bottom of my front load washer. I have hard water and I was surprised when my clothes came out brighter and softer without a residue. An added bonus...when I took them out of the dryer they smelled like they had been dried in the fresh air! LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: cefam

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been “cleaning up” our products at home for awhile now. I’ve used safer options like Seventh Generation, All, Norwex, etc. So far, Molly Suds is my favorite! Our clothes come out so fresh and with very little powder needed. Plus, it has worked well for my sensitive skin children and infant. I will continue to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: T. Overbee

customer_reviews.title: Not great for smelly T-shirts
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of this detergent & it worked great for my clothes, but the husband's workout shirts took 3x washing cycles + getting hung out in the sun to get the smells out. Had to switch back to Ecos.
customer_reviews.author: wkz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazed
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I bought the unscented for my 30-year-old son to use at his place and the peppermint for our house. I have also purchased the whitener and the dryer balls. I have been so fed up with all the toxic ingredients in our products that are so unnecessary. I have purged my entire house of all the toxins and can’t believe the difference. The laundry was a good place to start. I love that it only takes a small amount of the detergent and whitener. The dryer balls are amazing. I will never use anything else for my family’s laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Fades!
customer_reviews.text: Faded colors horribly and left bleach like marks on my shirts! Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dissolve - very disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap to hand wash my cleaning cloths. It does not dissolve in hot water. Tiny white particles remain in the soaking water and on the cloths. I was highly disappointed. I went back to my Norwex soap, which is clean and does a superb job. As stated, there are tiny holes in the package, but it makes for a messy area around the placement of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Clothes are clean with no fabreeze!  Thank you
customer_reviews.text: It’s great! I might try the scented one next time. Thanks Molly!!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight504

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Molly's Suds for about a year due to gallery issues, this has been great. Cleans as well as other detergents. Molly's Suds are no more expensive than other detergents.
customer_reviews.author: tom farrell

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, Helps with allergies
customer_reviews.text: Molly’s Suds are perfect for sensitive skin and all skin really. My kids suffer from skin allergies and this has cleared up the small bumps on their arms. The clothes are clean and fresh with no residue. We LOVE these products! The Lavender scented suds are wonderful too.
customer_reviews.author: amanda lackey

customer_reviews.title: Safer product chemical-wise
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this is a safer product than most laundry detergents chemical-wise and fragrance free, but unfortunately it didn't seem to get a lot of the stains / soiled spots out.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great Laundry Powder
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Moll'ys Suds unscented laundry powder for over 3 years. It cleans effectively and completely. I am a natural product devotee, and this fits the bill. Also like that it is rated 1 on EWG. Very cost efficient. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: DeppGirl

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Good job cleaning clothes. Works as well as Nellie's, but is less costly.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Best toxin free laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best toxin free laundry soap I have tried! Gets and keeps our clothes clean without the nasty chemicals in other commercial laundry soaps.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Fosler

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell of clean without harmful ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: Used it a couple times so far and love the no fragrance-just- clean scent! Been hunting around for a safe detergent for baby that can also clean mine and husband’s sweaty clothes. We only do laundry once a week and it gets rids of any musty lingering smells from our clothes!
customer_reviews.author: JESSIRE PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: the deeply moving story of how it came to be...
customer_reviews.text: this is my second bag of molly’s suds and i have no plans to use another washing powder going forward..it cleans wonderfully well and uses so lesser powder than most other washing powders..i love the story of how it was developed and the safe ingredients it is composed of...thank you with much love for creating it...
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Love that the formula is effective and safe. I wash everything with molly suds! I even bought the wool dryer rounds. Highly recommend any of their products
customer_reviews.author: Shep

customer_reviews.title: Protect your family, Pitch the deadly chemicals, use this instead!
customer_reviews.text: This works fantastic, We were apprehensive about going to a powder from a liquid but have had absolutely no problems. Our laundry comes out clean, even our adult kids were impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wallace

customer_reviews.title: I'm honestly impressed as I'm very skeptical of Laundry detergents and this worked great. -- I'll be buying again
customer_reviews.text: Washed the bed sheets and blanket they are so fresh and clean feeling. I'm honestly impressed as I'm very skeptical of Laundry detergents and this worked great. -- I'll be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Webb

customer_reviews.title: Molly’s Suds
customer_reviews.text: Cleans clothes well. Great for sensitive skin. A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergies
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to most laundry detergents, including free and clear and hypoallergenic varieties. This is the one detergent that she is not sensitive to! Love the product and cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Thea Nash

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby clothes and regular laundry.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very concentrated - a little goes a long way. Great product also for regular clothes without toxic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Not effective at stain or odor removal and fades clothing after just 1 wash. Clothes just don't come out smelling fresh and have to go through an extra rinse cycle to smell presentable. I'm using this until I find an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is gentle on my extremely sensitive skin and it actually cleans very well. This is my second purchase of the product. The first tie I got the peppermint scent, which is a little overwhelming. Much happier with the unscented.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Buntz

customer_reviews.title: ... detergent for about a week but so far I love it! Works great though I will say it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this detergent for about a week but so far I love it! Works great though I will say it has not removed the campfire odor from clothing. Seems to do a great job cleaning and I am so happy to find a clean detergent that does not bother my families sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mommy that works full time I needed to find a company I can love and trust. I have recently done lots of research on making my home as toxic free as possible and Molly Suds exceeded my standards. I am very please with my purchase. Thank you for being such a transparent company we really need more out there like you.
customer_reviews.author: Brittanie

customer_reviews.title: Great prduct
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. I get unscented and add a few drops of organic lavender. Only negative is I wish in came in ecofriendly bag.
customer_reviews.author: Wynona

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product so far has not caused ANY itching or problems like other supposedly unscented/perfume/dye free detergents. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Che

customer_reviews.title: like NOTHING lol
customer_reviews.text: My laundry smells now.... like NOTHING lol. I like it. It does seem a lot cleaner and softer than using cheap liquid detergents.
customer_reviews.author: JKW

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Rinses clean, no residue like other natural detergents and gets everything superclean even in cold water. It is gentle enough for our babies, dogs & cats, and me- I'm sensitive to a large amount of laundry detergents. Recommended 100%
customer_reviews.author: Renee LeMoyne

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I used on my baby’s clothes as she has recently been diagnosed with eczema and it seems to work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: My husband has very sensitive skin and this is perfect for him. Also, this lacks the harsh chemicals often found in store bought detergents. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!!!
customer_reviews.text: The clothes dont seem to have that after laundry residue and seem/smell clean and fresh without fragrance!!! My husband is a convert as well!!! I wish I knew about this when I first had my daughter. Next baby will definitely use this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be working great, gets clothes clean with no residue.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fargis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Molly’s Suds! It gets laundry clean and is very gentle on sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: ERO

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a detergent that my skin could tolerate - & my search is now ended. My laundry is clean, smells great & my skin is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Strandberg

customer_reviews.title: All natural laundry soap works great
customer_reviews.text: Like that Molly's suds is all natural with no unwanted smells. One Tblsp per normal load gets my clothes clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy a kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite eczema friendly wash
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for us. Our twins have eczema and we avoid anything with harsh detergents, chemicals, and fragrances. This is perfect for our laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like it for my baby’s clothes but next time I’ll try the lavender scented one
customer_reviews.author: Daniela A

customer_reviews.title: but I like it otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell if it is working, but I like it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Loyal customer for life - love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Will never go back to the chemical liquid detergent again. Thank you Molly’s Suds!
customer_reviews.author: Carly H.

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Natural detergent without scent, good to my liking, one pack can be used for long time
customer_reviews.author: Meryl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: We love this product. Been looking for something that was gentle on our skin and this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Christina Mariotis

customer_reviews.title: 1 bag is very Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: I used this to wash my babies clothes. Liked how gentle Molly's Suds is on my babies clothes but not affective for my husbands work out gym clothes.
customer_reviews.author: SimmsBruder

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to use for my boyfriend who has ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my boyfriend who has severe psoriasis. This has worked flawlessly and not only cleans the clothes very well but has ZERO reaction from his skin.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina Gursky

customer_reviews.title: Bleaches your clothes
customer_reviews.text: Definitely ruins your clothes, I don’t recommend. This is the third shirt that’s been ruined so I’m done with the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca LaPoint

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. No itchiness
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues with itchy skin from my clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: nontoxic products I’ve been searching for a good detergent and finally found it
customer_reviews.text: Ever since i switched to safer, nontoxic products I’ve been searching for a good detergent and finally found it! Safe, effective and they even have the option for nonsented which is perfect for my baby boys sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Miller

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy a powder again
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but I don't like breathing the powder. I prefer liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Frances Ellis PhD

customer_reviews.title: Laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Free of toxins, and great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Brian Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: On our second bag and loving this product, works great, no complaints! Thankful to have found something clean and effective!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Harris

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this!! I'm extremely sensitive to any kind of fragrance, perfumes & dyes. Molly's Suds gently made my clothes clean without all the itchiness! I'd definitely recommend Molly's Suds!
customer_reviews.author: MGT

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first but this stuff is awesome. My clothes are so clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only straight forward detergent, I can find that cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! It cleans really well and my skin does not react to it! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Tara P.

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction to product
customer_reviews.text: I did not find this product to wash my clothes very well. Also, this product made it very hard for me to breath and my skin would get itchy being around it. I do not have any known allergies to the ingredients listed on the package, so I'm not sure what is causing the problem. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Easter

customer_reviews.title: Works without toxins and smelly perfumes
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat customer. I wanted a detergent that was nontoxic and fragrance-free that also did a great job getting my laundry looking and smelling clean. This passed the test with all of our laundry including sweaty teeage boy clothes and dog blankets . I appreciate that it is economical as well-- I can often use less than indicated for a lot of loads. The package is smaller than the big jugs you typically buy to do the same number of loads, so it doesn't take up much space. No complaints-- will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: holland1

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product. I have very sensitive skin and I'm trying hard to find products with the most minimal ingredients possible. However, you might want to look up what each ingredient in this product does: they all soften water. None of the ingredients are actually cleaners. Nonetheless, I gave it a go and washed my first load today. I pulled my clothes out of the washing machine, and the armpits of my shirts all smell like body odor still. I can't recommend this product. :(
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Molly’s is a winner
customer_reviews.text: I have been making my own laundry soap for a few years now. It works pretty well, but I haven’t been satisfied with it of late. I went looking for an unscented, no dye powder soap and decided to give Molly’s a try. Wow, it really works. It has gotten the clothes whiter that I thought were goners. It is truly unscented and it leaves the clothes feeling really clean. I use white vinegar in the fabric softener space.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ramseyer

customer_reviews.title: Gets clothes clean, no weird residue
customer_reviews.text: This laundry detergent is great! It lasts forever, dissolves easily in hot water, and gets my clothes clean. I accidentally bought the not HE version but haven't had any foaming issues in my HE washer. I'll double the amount I add for extra gross loads (like kitchen towels) but this detergent works fabulously at it's indicated use as well. I've had conventional powder detergents leave weird residue on the clothes, I don't have that issue with this.
customer_reviews.author: Magenta Prex

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I was a little sceptical that one scoop of this detergent would clean a full load of laundry but it did. I washed a full load and used the Molly Suds exactly as directed (one scoop) and washed in cold water. I'm amazed at how bright and clean my clothes look and feel. I'm so pleased that there is no special perfumes and I get no skin irritation also. I will be using this economical detergent from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Cathe C

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I live in Arizona and the water here is pretty hard. I find this product works best with some white vinegar an essential oils. I deducted a start because sometimes it's leaves white marks on some of my darker clothes. Not a huge issue, it wipes away somewhat easy or washes off on the next wash, but just a pain sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: My oldest was reacting to a product I was using, my youngest is allergic to coconut, & the last natural detergent didn’t clean my clothes as well or keep the color. I was happy to find this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great value
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for several months now (I'm sure I've done more than the advertised 70 loads!). I love how it's environmentally friendly and at the same time very economical. It works well for normal loads--I haven't tried it on any tough stains. I'm satisfied and will order it again when I finally run out.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Golus

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry “soap” especially for people with allergies
customer_reviews.text: My family has used Tide laundry detergent for more than 30 years. However, my wife recently developed allergies to many household products to include Tide. After many hours of product research I selected Molly’s Suds and it has performs beautifully!! All natural food grade ingredients and zero allergic reactions. I’m thoroughly impressed. By the way it suds very little if at all, but, the clothes are clean and they smell clean without the added perfumes and harsh chemicals found in other detergents.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far seems to be working great! Has even been taking out the urine smell after my toddler has his potty accidents.
customer_reviews.author: innerpeace37

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product That Lasts a Long Time - Excellent VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Molly’s Suds! I don’t like detergents with harsh chemicals and scents, but I want something I can trust to really clean my clothes, sheets, towels, and stubborn stains. I find that one bag does a LOT of laundry, so it is also cost effective. I love it so much, I have it shipped to my daughter at college, and my daughter out of state.
customer_reviews.author: Paula J. Penna

customer_reviews.title: Good for allergic skin
customer_reviews.text: P&G appears to be discontinuing Ivory Snow detergent, which has been the only thing I knew I could use that wouldn’t cause breakouts. This seems too simple, but actually works. And no allergic reaction! Whew- I was nervous. As a bonus, this is much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: an

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I found this product. Firstly, just one tablespoon to get a clean load of laundry is amazing. Secondly I’m so happy to be using a much safer product for my family’s health, not to mention the environment. My laundry get clean and fresh and I will happily continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent detergent.  Gets clothes clean.  No fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: I believe this detergent stacks up quite well against Norwex detergent. I gave both a try, and both did an excellent job cleaning all sorts of laundry - towels, bedding, microfiber clothes, stinky outdoor work clothes, pet blankets, and normal loads of clothes. Molly's Suds is less expensive per load.
customer_reviews.author: J. Claire

customer_reviews.title: great detergent
customer_reviews.text: we really like this laundry soap - it leaves laundry clean and fresh with no scent. it has none of the bad stuff-petrochemicals, phosphates, formaldehyde, etc- so it's safe for our family and good for the environment. every little bit helps in protecting our planet.
customer_reviews.author: dogged

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Newborn Clothes
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a safe detergent to wash my newborns clothes in. After ready reviews and buying/using... I am overall happy with this item. I would buy again. M
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: My clothes don't smell like chemicals. The cottons are soft and don't retain smell. Amazingly my front loader does not stink for the first time since owning it. We are sold a bunch of nonsense by marketers. All those chemicals are not cleaning anything. They just coat our clothes and mask smells with other chemical fragrances. I like not wearing carcinogens on my body. Thank you Molly Suds.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do the job. Won't buy it again. After a wash, the powder is clumped in a laundry detergent container. The only reason why I switched to this one is because my favorite brand's price went up...I guess I am going back to the previous washing powder.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Unscented.
customer_reviews.text: This product cleans better than other products I have used in the last few years. Has no fillers and no scent added. Comes in minimal packaging for reducing waste. Good deal all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Keri McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: and I'm very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my first step into the world of more natural laundry detergent, and I'm very pleased with my purchase. It works just as well as any previous brands (usually I used All Free and Clear) - everything feels and smells clean, no weird stains, it's exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Grace

customer_reviews.title: Unwashed clothes after use
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t clean anything. Leaves a terrible scent behind and my clothes were dirty despite following all the directions and using HE machine. Going back to The Laundress. Horrible results
customer_reviews.author: jackie O

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin is extremely sensitive and after years of using Tide Free, I made the switch to Molly's Suds last year and haven't looked back. This bag of powdered detergent lasts me forever (about 4 months) and does a fine job of cleaning my clothes, towels, etc. I like that it doesn't contain harsh chemicals or have any dyes or perfumes. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Gentlest laundry detergent I ever used.
customer_reviews.text: No more hives, rashes, welts! Super sensitive skin. Arm & Hammer free gave me tons of problems until I finally figured it out. This soap is fantastic. Clothes are soft and smell great. Maybe it won’t work on heavy duty grease but for underwear, towels, sheets, etc. I love love love it. Thanks Molly!
customer_reviews.author: safarisue

customer_reviews.title: I needed to switch to another laundry product after an ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed to switch to another laundry product after an allergic reaction (hives) to a "natural" yet highly scented one. So far I have not had a reaction to this laundry powder and it seems to clean my clothes & linens well. I will be re-ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth BlueTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, but it does a very good job and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Molly 's Suds is a go!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this!! cleans really well! The only thing I wish it came with a scooper!! I was using 7th generation pods so I would just pop them in, super easy, now with these I had to go get a scooper so I can have consistency with each load. Not a big deal but I want a scooper! lol!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela M. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Saves money and leaves laundry fresh and clean. For stains, would probably need extra bleach. I would, however, like to know exactly what is in this laundry product, as I could find no information on the package.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I love this! No smell, no dyes, no harsh chemicals. It cleans everything from my infants clothes to my husbands mechanic shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Ktildes

product_meta.title: Molly's Suds Unscented Laundry Detergent Powder, 70 Loads, Natural Laundry Soap for Sensitive Skin
feature_bullets: SUPER CONCENTRATED, NATURAL AND EFFECTIVE Unscented Laundry Powder was developed to be eco-friendly and people-safe. Designed for those who are chemically sensitive or have sensitive skin. Safe for all fabric types except silk and leather - including synthetic, blends, and natural fibers with no risk of fading.

PRETREAT STAINS before washing, our concentrated powder packs a powerful cleaning punch. Wet the area from the inside out with cool water, make a paste of the Laundry Powder and apply over the stain, gently brushing into the garment, allow to set before rinsing and launder as usual.

PERFECT FOR HIGH-EFFICIENCY WASHING MACHINES, our formula gently and effectively cleans even the dirtiest garments while producing minimal suds, so it doesn't block and damage HE machine sensors. Our Laundry Powder contains no chemical-based sudsing ingredients, which means you get a natural, effective, and low-suds clean.

FORMULATED WITH ONLY FOUR EARTH-DERIVED INGREDIENTS, our Unscented Laundry Powder is created using pure, quality ingredients that are safe for people and the planet. It is safe for those with skin sensitivities, allergies, eczema, fragrance sensitivities, and newborn clothing and bedding. This product is Certified Cruelty Free, Certified Vegan, Made in the USA, and Rated "A" in EWG's Guide to Healthy Cleaning.

WHAT'S INCLUDED: One 80.25 oz bag of Unscented Laundry Powder with a blue 1 TBSP measuring scoop. Contains 70 loads. This product does not contain any of the following: Synthetic Fragrances, Dyes, Optical Brighteners, Nonylphenol Ethoxylate, Petrochemicals, Phosphate, Fillers, Bleach, known carcinogens, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS), or Sodium Laureth Sulfate (SLES), 1,4 Dioxane, or Formaldehyde.
